topic.title: Hello / ਸਤ ਸ਼੍ਰੀ ਅਕਾਲ
topic.body:
How is everyone doing? / ਸਾਰੇ ਕਿੱਦੜਾਂ ਹੋ ?
Sorry for posting in an English channel, there isn't a one available for indic languages

1627752792_1QEtdbzwqJKCF45fTsC5hUjELk3HX.body:
> [zeroseed6e](#comment_6_17NZ2BiZ1HUYppUcUmU5bgyGkp8kH7UyXj): Why dont create a new zerotalk for your language? I Will add It on my pack

surely! but how do we go about it? i am kinda new to all this

> [heartandsoul](#comment_1_1MieUGUUVUxVmvuLNGcTXt9wVBSqpeztDT): How about the Coronavirus situation in India?50 K limit to be avoided! & code to enhance Browsing …

its quite better than one month ago, second wave seems to be behind us, on ground i can see fewer patients in the hospitals than a month before
